description: Try our easy to follow Apple Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Apple Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir with a wooden spoon until the sauce reaches your preferred consistency - either a smooth purée or more chunky. Taste and add more sugar, if required. Serve warm or cold with roast pork.
